subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Manning was off target for Denver, and Luck, although far from perfect, did enough to help Indianapolis beat the Broncos and advance the Colts to the A.F.C. title game.
snippet: Manning was off target for Denver, and Luck, although far from perfect, did enough to help Indianapolis beat the Broncos and advance the Colts to the A.F.C. title game.
